title: TEDxYouth@NewtonSixthForm: MAKE THAILAND COMPETITIVE THROUGH GOOD EDUCATION
description: โดย The Newton Group Our theme is "Make Thailand Competitive through Good Education". This event will feature speakers from The Newton Sixth Form, who will share their insights on how education can shape a better future for Thailand. SAT 18 MARCH 2023 13:00 PM – 15:00 PM Bangkok Art and Culture Centre, Auditorium 5th Floor. Click here https://bit.ly/41s4Xpc *LIMITED TO 100 SEATS This event is organized by NEWTON STUDENTS Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to learn, connect and be inspired. Reserve your seat now, as we have limited availability of only 100 seats. We can't wait to see you there! * ราคาสำหรับนักเรียนในเครือ The Newton : 100 บาท /ใบ ราคาสำหรับผู้ปกครองและบุคคลทั่วไป : 500 บาท /ใบ สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ คุณนภัสสร ราชคม โทร. 094-1913462 Facebook The Newton Sixth Form School (https://www.facebook.com/thenewtonsixthform/)
